user_query: I'm planning a family trip to a remote location and I need to ensure that we have access to the internet. Can you provide me with the status of the Vizor Ads API server? Additionally, I want to check if there are any network connectivity issues in the area. Fetch the evidence from the Blockchain of Bitcoin and Ethereum using the hash 'abcd1234' or the TrxId '9876xyz'.

TaskList.description: Check the status of the Vizor Ads API server.
Evaluate network connectivity issues in the specified remote area.
Fetch evidence from the Blockchain for Bitcoin and Ethereum using the provided hash or TrxId.
